text: K. Chinnapponnu alias Kamatchi, 53, a resident of Ariyalur has been detained under Goondas Act on Monday. The City Commissioner of Police issued the orders based on the recommendations of Inspector of Police, Narcotics Intelligence Bureau- CID. A release issued here on Monday said that the woman was arrested on a charge of possessing and selling ganja near the auto stand in Srirangam Railway station on January 14. Ganja weighing about 5.4 kg was seized from her then. She was earlier involved in seven cases of which she had been convicted in three cases.
title: Woman detained under Goondas Act
